description: The house is located in a quiet place surrounded by greenery and from the terrace there is a breathtaking view. The space is flooded with light. The bedroom is comfortable and cozy and the living room is spacious, with wooden floors and an antique stone wall with arch-shaped windows. You will find a small but comfortable kitchen and on the terrace a comfortable sofa to watch the sunset and enjoy a morning coffee. the house is close by the hiking trails in the forest.The spaceSmoking is only allowed on the terrace :)Guest accessin your stay you will enjoy my intire sweet home where youll have a living room, seperate bedroom, small kitchen and a balcony with a stunning view.Other things to notethe location of the house is 2 minutes away from the bus station and also few minutes away from the beautiful churches of ein karem, the orchids where you can find fruits of the season, speciel trails in the village and of course a perfect balcony in the house to relax with a cup of tea at the end of the day.
interaction: hi! i will be available for you on the phone or in person :)
transit: A few minutes walk from the house there is a bus stop from which you can reach Mount Herzl to the light rail station.

reviews.comments:
This place is located in one of the most beautiful places in Jerusalem with stunning views and lovely host.
The apartment is very cozy and nicely decorated, full of light and the terrace is big and with beautiful mountains views.
You have everything you need for cooking, coffee and the bed is very comfortable.
The neighbors are nice and parking was easy.
You can take the bus on a quick 5 minute ride to connect to the light train and from there it is 15 minutes to the train station, central bus station and 20 minutes to the market and city central.
Merav is super nice and friendly and very welcoming.
Will stay there again for sure.

Do not look further. You have found the perfect place. Merav is a wonderful person and her home is a sanctuary close enough to the city to enjoy all it has to offer. Ein Karem is the   'power spot'  of Jerusalem and  this house has exceptional views, privacy, and a great energy. Merav even left a bottle of wine for me and drove me from the center of town. She is ready to talk about her country and she has led an interesting life. She contributes greatly to the authentic Israel experience  and speaks English beautifully!

We got to the cabin much later then the check in time yet the host was very patient
About it and was there to great us in to her house,
Merav is a very kind spirited host who welcomed us and really made us feel like its are home.
The View was breathtaking
Really felt like an oasis in the middle of the busy Jerusalem
Her cabin has a great Energy,
And the gorgeous stone wall separating the bedroom from living room, you really get to live merav’s life for your stay!
Definitely be back next time we’re in Israel!
Merav thank you so much you really add a lot to our trip❤️

Just WOW. Merav is the best host ever. I arrived late and she was very flexible. When i arrived she greeted me and gave me a tour. She even had fruit for me and everything was set up nicely. The view is spectacular. If you are looking for somewhere quiet & peaceful this is the place for you. The bus stop is right outside (you will need a bus card, easy to get in the store right next to the bus stop) and it wll take you to the train station and that train will take you to where you need to go. Perfectly safe here and so cozy! Right down the street is a lagoon as well. I will deff stay here again

The place is perfect for couples for romantic getaway. It is very close to the Ein Kerem centre with all its restaurants and churches. Still it is quiet, there are many nature trails around, feels like being in a countryside. The place itself is special and has its own character. It was very clean and Merav was welcoming and helpful and nice to communicate with.

Merav's apartment is very charming, cozy and clean. Located in a quiet street and surrounded by nature, we had an amazing time there. The location is also good, at walking distance from attractions, restaurants and the bus stop to Jerusalem. Merav was available by phone the whole time. Most certainly one of the best places to stay if you want to explore Ein Kerem!

Unpleasant host, who violated our agreement, made me feel uncomfortable and eventually kicked me out early and refused to pay me back. I wouldn't recommend trying your luck with this scammer, not worth your time, money and well-being.

I had a wonderful time at Mera'v apartment - it is super cosy and comfortable, was really a great spot to relax. The kitchen had everything I needed to cook for myself, and had a wonderful time having meals and coffee on the balcony overlooking the Jerusalem mountains area. The apartment is minutes away from several different beautiful nature trails. Merav was a super host - very helpful and communicative with anything I needed (including great tips for walking trails in the area) and very friendly . I highly recommend staying here.
Meirav was outgoing and helpful, and her home is cozy and rustic. We felt at home with ease, and enjoyed the proximity to both nature and the town.

We enjoyed very much our stay at Merav's flat, it has a great and special atmosphere. It is small but has everything you need for a few relaxing days. Merav's tips for visiting in and around Ein Kerem helped a lot to enjoy and get to know this special place. Looking forward to come back.

We enjoyed our stay at Merav’s apartment so much that we returned for a second stay. The space and the environment are exactly as Merav has described and we share wholeheartedly the positive comments from other guests.  It was a lovely, restful place to stay and we enjoyed walking the nearby trails. We used the excellent public transport system with our Rav Kav cards and were able to arrive in central Jerusalem in about 40 minutes.
Merav's home and hospitality were even better than I expected. The view is spectacular, with a perfect "coffee porch" and cute little touches throughout the home. I highly recommend relaxing here!

Merav’s place is a gem! Perfectly located, beautifully decorated and the view is spectacular. Merav was extremely communicative and was flexible about my check in and check out times. I highly recommend it!
We had a lovely stay at Merav's beautiful place. The apartment is very well kept and has a gorgeous view. The kitchen is great for cooking and Merav was a very helpful host :) highly recommended

דירה קסומה עם מרפסת שמשקיפה לנוף פורח ומשגע של יער וטראסות.
השכונה מדהימה ומיוחדת והדירה במיקום מרכזי, נוח, קרובה למסעדות.
המארחת אכפתית, תקשורתית, אדיבה ונעימה.
ממליצים בחום ואהבה ❤️
מירב מקסימה, אפילו השאירה בקבוק יין כי ידעה שאנחנו חוגגים. לצערי רמת התחזוקה של היחידה ירודה יחסית(ברזים,כיורים) מערכת החשמל קופצת לעיתים והציוד מפוזר ברחבי הדירה. בכל זאת המיקום נפלא
היה נפלא! מדויק ונעים

בית נקי,מיקום מדהים ומארחת טובת לב
יכולתי להמשיך לגור שם.

הייתה לנו שהות מדהימה בבית של מירב. המיקום מושלם, המרפסת מרחיבה את הלב, הנוף מדהים, הבית שטוף שמש וסטייל. מירב מקסימה אדיבה ורספונסיבית, גמישה בשעות של צק אין וצק אווט ויש לה המון סבלנות והמון מידע על עין כרם. היה לנו כיף ביותר!

Merev est digne de confiance. Toujours au bon soin pour que le séjour soit agréable.

Encore merci pour la bouteille de vin et les dattes.

Ich habe mich in Meravs geschmack- und fantasievoller Wohnung sehr wohl gefühlt, sie war eine tolle Gastgeberin, auch wenn ich sie gar nicht getroffen habe. Sie hat mir alle nötigen Informationen für den Check-In sehr schnell  und verständlich  gegeben, hatte super Tipps zum Wandern in der Umgebung, in der Wohnung war alles vorhanden ,was man braucht zum Wohnen und Wohlfühlen.  Von der schattigen Nordterrasse hat man einen herrlichen Blick und ist in wenigen Metern im Naturschutzgebiet von En Kerem.
הגענו לסופ"ש בעין כרם, הדירה נעימה ויפהפייה. מיקום נוח בכניסה המערבית לעין כרם. מירב המארחת זמינה לכל שאלה ונתנה אחלה טיפים למקומות שווים בעין כרם.

name: Apartment with private balcony
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Elevator - The home or building has an elevator that’s at least 52 inches deep and a doorway at least 32 inches wide.
Pets allowed - Assistance animals are always allowed
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: Our place has a stunning view of jerusalem and its surrownding mountains. The apt has 2 bedrooms and one living room. The kitchen is fully equipped and we have ac and floor heating. Wi fi is available for free and theres a cable tv.The spaceSpend you Jerusalem holiday in the perfect place: a new 3 rooms apt. (60 square metters) The apt. is located in the lovely and quiet Holyland neighborhood, overlooking an incredible view of Jerusalem and the mountains surrounding it, and enjoys lot of fresh air. It is a great Viewpoint of the renewed Deer Valley which offers a lovely green spot in the middle of the city. The apt offers not only stunning views, but also easy access from the main Begin Road. It is equipped with a very comfortable bed in both bedrooms, air conditioning, a TV, wireless internet connection, kosher kitchen (with: refrigerator, microwave ,oven, a kettle and dishes). You are more than welcome to drink your morning coffee in the big porch, or swing in the hammock. We supply clean towels and linens, and offer a cleaning service once a week (no extra fee). The location is great for couples and families alike: just 3 minutes from the Malha mall, and 3 minutes from the biblical zoo and from the Deer Valley. The apt. is located on -2 floor. the elevator is available to -1 floor.(one and half floor by stairs)Guest accessOur guests will also have access to a room with a washing machine and a dryer, and the complex has an elevator and the parking is free.

reviews.comments: Lovely apartment. Balcony was really nice.   Would definitely stay again

Une vue panoramique sur l’ensemble de Jérusalem accompagnée de terrasse où passer un très agréable moment en famille avec l’hospitalité du propriétaire
Claude
Très bon service, rien à dire.

name: Room in Spacious Jerusalem Apartment
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Lock on bedroom door - Private room can be locked for safety and privacy
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Single level home - No stairs in home
Luggage dropoff allowed - For guests' convenience when they have early arrival or late departure
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: ~ Large room in a spacious, clean, comfortable apartment.~ Quiet apartment occupied by one female. No pets.~ One flight up, (18 stairs.)~ Near transportation, supermarkets, and shuls.~ Spacious common area.~ Available for Shabbat and kashrut respectful, female non smokers.The spaceThe bedroom is just over 12 sq. meters (130 sq. feet) in size.  It contains a single bed, and a second pull out bed.There is loads of closet hanging space plus shelves.  There is a utility porch which has a washer, but no dryer.The primary bathroom contains a shower, (no tub.)  There is a second small bathroom, right outside the bedroom,  with a small sink and toilet, exclusively for guest use.Guest access~The entire shared area and its contents are available to the guests.~The apartment is available to someone who is Shabbat respectful, ie. someone who will keep non Shabbat activities to the privacy of their room.The kitchen is kosher, with separate dishes and utensils for meat and dairy.  Separate kitchenware is provided for non kosher keeping guests.Other things to noteI’m happy to provide some **perks**  to make your trip more relaxing.•Arranging for a phone plan while on your trip can be a time consuming hassle.  I provide a free nano sim card, with unlimited local and US phone calls, plus data. • Summers in Jerusalem can be hot and humid.  Please help yourself to a cold water bottle each day of your trip.• Complementary coffee, tea, milk, and cold cereal available.
additional_house_rules:
~ Please treat the home and its belongings as you would your own.  
~Please keep shared areas clean and clutter free.
~ Female guests only.
~Children of all ages ok, under parent's supervision, and are considered an extra person in the room.
~No check ins or check outs before sundown on Saturday.
interaction: I am happy to accommodate whatever it is you might need, and to flow with a comfortable balance between friendly interaction and quiet privacy for all.
transit: ~ Street parking is available.~ There are a number of bus stops nearby.

name: The colorful house in the Jerusalem mountain
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Pets allowed - Assistance animals are always allowed
description: Cozy, spacious, flora, fully furnished and beautiful apartment in the Jerusalem mountains where you'll be able to experience a beutiful  and quite place to relax, enjoy, and breath the outstanding air of Jerusalem.We have a large and fully equipped kitchen, pleasant living room and private big yard that was renovated with green grass, and a great seating area.Also, your pets are very welcomed in our house:)The spaceThe house has its own and private enterance, which gives guests full privacy and ability to enjoy the unique atmosphere of the stunning Jerusalem mountains.our apartment can easily housed up to 4-5 people, with one privat bedroom with double bed queen size, a huge sofe in the living room that can use as a bed for 2 more people. We also have plenty of warm blankets for the cold Jerusalem nights.
transit: Our house is located right next to the colorful and vibrant Abu Goush village where you can find Market, authentic resturants and more. Yet, in a quiet and peaceful moshav called Beit Nekofa: 10 min. from Jerusalem, and only 35 min. from Tel-Aviv, you'll be able to experience a beutiful  and quite place to relax, enjoy, and breath the outstanding air of Jerusalem.A great get away from the hectic city, exactly what you need in order to get your mind off the stressful daily life.To get to the moshav, you can travel by private car or take a bus from any city and get off at the Hemed interchange. From there it is only a 10 minute walk to the entrance of the house.

reviews.comments:
The hostesses respond quickly and are very nice.
The place is very cozy and fully equipped.
The design is very homey and The garden is spacious and pleasant, our dog enjoyed it very much.
There are a lot of places to travel or have a picnic in the area (with a car).
our stay was really nice, the mountains around are beautiful and it's very close to a spring. the nearby tow Abu gosh has great flod
Nice place!
Lovely place with a homey feel. The house is spotless clean and inviting. We much enjoyed our stay and would definitely come back on our next venture.
homey place, very quite 5/5

Our stay here was perfect. Just what we were looking for a quiet night away and a close drive to the Old City.

Ortal was beyond helpful and provided us with everything we needed. Definitely recommend !
Ortal's place is a nice pearl for anyone looking for a calming, nurturing, quiet place. Simple, yet filled with toughtful touch, this place was just perfect for our weekend experience.

The Place is great! had everything we needed and was super clean. Communication with Ortal was super easy and quick. The garden is great to sit in the sun and chill and the surroundings of beit nekofa are beautiful!
A beautiful fresh space with lots of simple fresh lovely touches. The moshav and surrounding mountains are gorgeous with beautiful hikes all around. A perfect getaway.
נפלא, באמת.
היה אירוח מעולה, בדיוק מה שהיינו צריכות ♥️

מקום מקסים, נעים ונקי, במיקום יפיפה.
מרגע שהגענו הרגשנו בבית.
תודה על ערב מקסים עם כל מה שצריך.
הדירה נעימה, החצר מזמינה. היחס נהדר. המושב במיקום נהדר לטיולים. כל מה שצריך בחופשה!
תודה

name: Tzefania Apartments (306)
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Backyard - An open space on the property usually covered in grass
Luggage dropoff allowed - For guests' convenience when they have early arrival or late departure
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: Welcome to Tzefania Apartments, a long-standing establishment of Jerusalem. Founded as early as 1947, Tzefania Apartments have been run by three consecutive generations of our family. We invite you to relish our history, photos, and most importantly, the authentic Jerusalem ambiance.The spaceOur apartments are simple & clean, recently renovated, and offer good value for your money. Our cleaning services are offered every 3 days during your stay (free of additional charge). We want to offer an experience and depth to your visit in Jerusalem that will stay with you for a long time. In addition, the Tzefania apartments are also welcome Sabbath-keepers, and therefore all the apartments including kosher dishes, a special electric kettle for Shabbat, hot water for the shower with Shabbat clock, electric Shabbat lamp, plastic plates and plastic cups. All to make you feel comfortable.Check in time: If you land in Israel late at night, you do not have to worry about. Our apartments are arranged free entry without any help, using a special code, so you are not dependent on us.Our Building: The pictures speak for themselves. Art objects from Israeli and Jewish history are hung throughout the building, and you can be impressed and learn from the great collection. We offer you a pleasant and spacious garden that surrounds the building, and if you wish, you can arrange in advance to entertain friends in the garden or celebrate holidays here together, such as Sukkot.Leave us a message and we will get back to you shortly.Guest accessComfortable beds | kitchenette | kitchenware | coffee utensils | complimentary personal care items | LED TV set | air conditioner | lounge | optional long-term rental | daily reception desk.Other things to noteBased on local tax laws, ISRAELI CITIZENS must pay VAT. This VAT tax is not automatically calculated in the total cost of the reservation, and must be paid at the check in or in advance via airbnb. we print receipts. As well, ALL OTHER GUESTS, must let us copy their Passport WITH THE BLUE FORM you will recieved at border control. without those two, you will also be needed to pay VAT TAX.

reviews.comments: Great spot and great people
It was a really nice apartment! I definitely enjoyed my stay.
Wonderful place and location

The pictures of the airbnb are accurate, The location is close enough to everything, that you can actually walk everywhere, The hosts were fantastic, they went out of their way to make me feel comfortable, there were a few extras I did not expect, I was completely satisfied and I will hopefully return.
Charming yet up to date. Quiet. Located conveniently to bus stops & shops. This is a great place!
The place was nice and clean and the location was great. Very accommodating hosts. I would definitely recommend it.
nice place. good location. would definitely stay again

The apartment is better than it looks on the pictures. It is very clean, beautiful, with nice touches: mirrors, lamps, a bureau for writing or laptop, a big wardrobe, cold water faucet and a kettle for Shabbat. I liked the picturesque courtyard and excellent security. Asaf and Oded were always ready to assist with any questions and helped to order Sherut for the airport.  Also, the wi-fi was working well (which is not always the case in my experience). Thank you for your great hospitality!
Clean simple quiet in the heart of orthodox Jerusalem. Great value!! Can't wait to go back!

The apt was nice and clean and I appreciate the early check in. You need to know the apt is located in a very orthodox neighborhood and kinda scary at night. Difficult to find stuff around and far from everything. The building smelled like smoke even though there were no smoking signs, and even the guy who checked us in was smoking while checking us in. Lots of steps so not a good idea to take ur grandma there .
Good location in othodox neighbourhood. Close to the Old city and all the historic sites. Very good communication with the owners. Happy family with small and beautiful kid running the apartment.

Recommended!
Very nice and welcoming people, room as described & clean, super responsive and good directions before arrival.

Spotlessly clean, we were greeted with bottled water and milk in the room. The room itself is close quarters, but the photos are very realistic. Asaf was very responsive to questions and gave us lots of help: ESPECIALLY about parking in the area on Shabbat. For potential guests: the guest house itself is perfectly fine, but inform yourself carefully about the neighbourhood (Mea She'arim) before you book here. Western women especially may not feel completely comfortable. However, in principle a good location as the old city is reasonably reached on foot.
Communication with the host is perfect,the apartment is very clean and has all necessary equipment.We enjoyed our stay in Tsfania and recommend the place to other travelers.
The landlady was very very kind hearted，give us lots of help，The apartment is convenient and quite，we can take the bus to anywhere from here，and spent a nice time in jerusalem
Very fine
The room was very tidy and clean. The beds were really comfortable. Sheets perfectly clean. I liked the house with the sense of old tradition. Couldn’t mame a better choice.
Everything was perfect. Beautiful rooms, cleaned. The host is very helpful and kind.
Very nice place
It was a nice appartment in a special neighborhood.

I can definitely recommend Tzefania Apartments and would stay there again. All descriptions and photos of the apartment were accurate. The building is located in a more orthodox neighbourhood and thereby offers a unique opportunity to have a glimpse into orthodox life in Jerusalem. The staff was very friendly, helpful and thoughtful. They even provided us with a list of restaurants and cafés which are open in the area during Shabat.

I can definitely recommend this Airbnb. The room was very clean and well furnished. The beds were really comfy, WiFi was working perfectly and there's a bus stop just around the corner (direct bus to the main bus station). We loved the cultural location and felt safe. Just keep in mind this is a religious neighborhood, so dress modestly and you wont have issues. There was a small problem with our reservation/check-in but they fixed it smoothly. Overall a very good Airbnb experience. Id book this place again if I ever go back to Jerusalem.

- high to recommend if you arrive in the night - check in was super easy
- very comfortable mattress
- good communication before arrival and during our stay by (Hidden by Airbnb)
- everything there you need, only in the kitchen is something for cooking missing, there is only a microwave
- it is quite small, but very clean and nice
- situated in new ultra-orthodox neighborhood close to jaffa street - we enjoyed the stay a lot and did a lot of walking which was great to explore Jerusalem
Thank you for the lovely experience

We really enjoy staying in this apartments. Asaf, Lilac and all team are very friendly and helpful. There are everything you need: photos of the room are correct. There is wonderful garden: then you came in you just feel youself as in the country: many flowers and peaceful atmosphere. As I said the team was very helpful but not obsessive, so we feel ourselves very comfort, private and idependent that is very important for us. Thanks for coffee everyday in our coffee can :)
The house is very cozy with lots of nice items.
As for neighborhood you should remember that apartments are in a orthodox area. If you wear respectfully to the place you won't have any problems. As we travel to visit Holy places of Jerusalem that wasn't a problem to wear skirts and t-shorts. Moreover Lilac at first day told us the best route to move around the area so we felt comfortable.
And besides it's a great unique opportunity to see the district during Shabbat!!! It's worth seeing, amazing.
The apartment are situated near the city center: it took us about 20-25 minutes to get to the walls of Old City on foot and only 10 minutes to Jaffa street with lots of cafes and shops.
So if you are ready to see really another life and respect local rules I can recommend this place to stay.
Thank all the team!

Asif and Eli are labelled as 'super hosts'. So untrue..!! They deserve the label of super duper super duper super duper hosts. Asif kept in touch with me right from the time I landed in Israel to the time I finished the stay at his place. And even beyond.
I reduced a day at his place and he refunded me in full. He drove me from Jerusalem to Tel Aviv. Helped me with my luggage to the next accommodation after driving me there. Drove me around to buy coffee to take home.

The lobby and walls are decorated to look like a boutique hotel. This is not a typical air b and b. There is reception and everything is SUPER safe - I actually never locked my room and I was carrying expensive cameras..!!

Parking is difficult there so when I reached them, there were people already waiting outside and took luggage out of the car swiftly. I returned after dropping the car and my heavy luggage was already in my room on third floor.

I know this is starting to sound like a paid commercial, so let me say something bad also. Hmmm let see what.. thinking... maybe the shower curtains could be longer so little water does not come out.

I highly recommend it for Asif and the location: You will life in orthodox Jewish area, a great eye opener for people like me who have not been exposed to this culture. For photographers, it is GREAT.
Very good conditions, well-furnished, clean flat. There are parking places nearby but take care to come here on Shabath.

Nice place to stay in Jerusalem! Everything was as its said. Asaf and all the other staff were quite friendly.
The surrounding are of the flat is ultra orthodox, which might be good to know for your own behaviour while walking through the neighbourhood. But its a great experience.
I‘d definately recommend you this place.
Had a great stay in Geula - totally recommend staying there
Eli's place is exactly as described and shown in the pictures. It's close to the downtown area and in walking distance to the old city. I would definitely book the apartment again.

It was a very nice stay at an apartment located close to the old city with a reasonable price. All our questions were answered very queakly and we were provided with all that we needed. In addition, I need to notice that it is a very quiet place during the night time, so you can easily relax after walking all day long.

Everything was fine, in a residential complex there is a manager who is always happy to answer questions and help. The apartment has everything you need for a comfortable stay but there was no cooking utensils.
Все было хорошо, в жилом комплексе есть менеджер, который всегда рад ответить на вопросы и помочь. В квартире есть все необходимое для комфортного проживания, но не было посуды для приготовления пищи.

Really convenient place and there are stores and bus stations around.

The room is small but pretty well equipped like table ware and clothes racks inside. And you can use the washing machine and kitchen downstairs (but not too late at night).

Good place for one or two people to live, we really appreciate the hosting.
Nice funtional and clean appartment near the city center and not to far from the old town. Good and friendly support by the staff.
Good price/quality balance, venue quite central,  (near Jaffa station tramway).
Loved the stay at Elis apartment! It's very  well located, everything is within a short walking distance. Eli was a very helpful and carrying host, would defiantly stay there again!
Eli is an extraordinary person. His place is exactly as described and even more. Greatfor an authentic experience, rightin the middle of cultureand history. Tottaly recomand him. All the best Eli!

Great place
Clean and nice, just as adviced.
I will stay there again
住宿在犹太社区里，很近的地方有免费停车场，入住很顺利，房间很有以色列风情。不过空调貌似功力不太足
L'appartement est très fonctionnel et pratique situé à proximité des transports en commun. Les hôtes sont très gentils et serviables et l'hôtel est vraiment original.

De lo mejor que he experimentado en Airbnb,por mucho! la experiencia ha sido superior a las expectativas,las fotos dicen menos de lo que realmente te encuentras,y los servicios,mejores a los de un hotel superior.Café, té, leche,agua de cortesía, vajilla casi completa,arreglaban los cuartos todos los días (excepto en sabbat).un 10! En todo.
Solo me veo en la obligación de advertir que está ubicado en medio de un barrio ultra ortodoxo,que si bien sumó a la experiencia en sí,por lo interesante para nosotros,debo advertirles,sobre todo a las damas,en poner cuidado en la vestimenta.
整栋楼很有特色

숙소는 굉장히 깔끔했으며, 편의시설이 모두 완벽히 구비되어 있었습니다.
다음날 정리도 해주었고, 수건을 새로 비치해주었으며, 방정리도 해주었습니다
호스트는 친절하고 호의적이었습니다
다만 위치가 유대인 구역이라 조금은 조심스러운 부분이 있었습니다
모든것이 감사했습니다
位置在百倍之地的北边，走路到古城大概25分钟左右。民宿的装修十分有格调，一草一木，每一个摆设和装饰都是精心设计的。房间内用品很多是宜家的。美中不足是，热水不是24小时提供的，只有指定时段才有。并且不知道他们的热水系统出了什么问题，一共住了3天，有2天在指定时段都没有热水洗澡。

Super emplacement, nos hôtes étaient adorables et toujours disponible si besoin.
Je conseille particulièrement cet hôtel si vous voulez une véritable immersion dans le monde ultra orthodoxe, quelques emplacements de places gratuits à quelques rues et on se déplace à pieds.
Accès à la vieille ville à pied sans problème !
Notre chambre n’était pas super propre mais je pense que cela vient de notre arrivée trop tôt, et ils nous ont laissé la place un peu trop vite ?
Quoi qu’il en soit rien de problématique
A booker sans soucis !
Chambre tout à fait adaptée pour un court séjour à Jérusalem. Important cependant de savoir qu'elle se situe dans le quartier ultra orthodoxe.
Apartamento  cómodo y muy buenas camas. Ubicado en barrio religioso a unos 10 minutos a pie de la peatonal de Jerusalem. La limpieza estuoenda. Recomendable

Eli war ein super Host. Sie hat sich sehr bemüht, dass wir uns wohl fühlen.
Die Lage war auch sehr günstig, alles zu Fuss erreichbar.
Danke Eli, gerne wieder.
Очень гостеприимно! Хорошее росположение,Lilac- супер.
We hebben een aangenaam verblijf gehad. De gastvrijheid van Eli was bijzonder hartelijk. Studio geen eigen kookgelegenheid. Uitstekende bedden met heerlijk donzen dekbed.

Le séjour chez Eli fut excellent, l'arrivée avec les infos d'Eli pour les clefs et le lieux de l'appartement très clair. L'appartement très propre et bien équipé. Un peu bruyant car beaucoup de circulation et de klaxonne mais pas gênant pour dormir. Eli très à l'écoute sur la moindre questions posées. On peut tout faire à pied pour la visite de Jérusalem, et sortir le soir pour les restos etc..
Si vous venez en voiture pas facile de se garer, payant dans la rue et interdit de circuler à pendant Shabbat, mais Eli est là pour vous rendre votre séjour agréable pour gérer et vous explique tout.
Excellent séjour pour nous!

Une petite location très propre, le descriptif est réel, très bien agencé par rapport à la taille, la douche et le toilette le plus propre que nous ayons trouvé ici... Les lits sont confortables, seul les bruits de la rue sont perceptibles dû au manque d'isolation phonique, à la circulation dense et la vie de la rue et du quartier ultra typique lui même.
Une bonne adresse à qui souhaite découvrir Jerusalem sous d'autres lumières. Accès à 20mn à pieds à jerusalem Old city.

Eine sehr saubere, zweckmäßige Wohnung. Durch den Schlüsselcode an der Tür und den Safe war ein unproblematischer Check-in und Check-out möglich! Des Weiteren bekam man zwei Schlüsselbunde, so dass man unabhängig voneinander Besichtigungen durchführen konnte. Das Apartement liegt relativ ruhig in der obersten 3. Etage in einem schönen Sandstein-Haus. Wir haben die Klimanalage nicht benötigt, obwohl es draußen über 40 Grad war. Eine Flasche Wasser, Kaffee, Tee, Zucker und Milch standen kostenlos zur Verfügung (Danke, Eli!). Die Kochecke ist für einen Kurztripp perfekt, für einen längeren Aufenthalt fehlt ein Herd. Im sehr sauberen kleinen Bad befanden sich Duschgel und Toilettenpapier. Für die unangenehme Gerüche von der Kanalisation im Badezimmer stand ein Raumspray zur Verfügung. Das kleine Badezimmer ist durch eine zweiseitige Schiebetür verbunden, praktisch, leise und platzsparend. Alles wirkt neu und sehr sauber. Wir haben uns in diesem kleinen Apartement von Anfang wie zu Hause gefühlt!
Ein kleines Apartment, nahe am Yedua Markt. Die Kommunikation und Buchung ging sehr schnell und war sehr unkompliziert
Cama boa, toalhas limpas, agua e frutas de cortesia. Porém o Wifi não funcionou!! Mal frequentado.

name: Great location in central East Jerusalem
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper

description: A great location in East Jerusalem's city centre that you will love! Comfortable and practical. Explore the Old City of Jerusalem while you stay with us. Only a 10 m walk to Damascus Gate & Old City. Only 1.5 Km to the Church of the Holy Sepulchre and about 1.6 Km to the Dome of the Rock and Al Aqsa Mosque.Taxi service next door. Mineral water, coffee, a variety of teas and fresh juice on the house, always!The spaceNice spacious two bedrooms. 1 full bathroom. Spacious living room and kitchen area with a terrace. Lively location. Kitchen has all that you need.  Generous dining area. Workspace. Enjoy on the house a wide selection of teas, fresh fruits, Espresso and Arabic coffees and mineral water. Work space. Guidebooks and magazines.Guest accessEntire apartment.Other things to notePlease conserve electricty and water use.
additional_house_rules: No smoking please except in balcony. Please conserve electricity use and keep apartment clean. No loud music. No extra guests. No pets please.
transit: Just a few minutes to the bus line and tram. Taxi service next door. Parking is just a couple of minutes away.

reviews.comments:
Nice and confortable apartment very close to the old city . Excellent wifi and
AC. Taxi, Market and a good take out food arround the corner. Ibrahim is an Excellent Host

We had a nice stay at Ibrahim and Sawsan's place. Ibrahim was great with communication throughout. He was very accommodating with our check in time as we didn't know how long it would take for us to cross the border from Jordan. The apartment itself is basic, clean, and was more than enough space for our group of four. It's located outside the old city, about a 25 minute walk from Masjid ul-Aqsa. Shops in the area close early, so be sure to stock up on drinking water and snacks earlier in the day.
Good location,attentive host, would stay there again.

Amazing location in East Jerusalem. This large two bedroom apartment was more than big enough to fit our family of five and could easily accommodate 6. Ibrahim was a great host, very responsive. The apartment was well set up for a family. We didn’t spend much time in the apartment admittedly but we made food two nights - simple meals. There is a supermarket and pharmacy round the corner and a public parking place five minutes walk away. The area is great, ten minutes to the old city, in the heart of east Jerusalem. Very safe and serene area. Happy walking here even at night. Vibrant local life. If you want to experience real life in this amazing city this area is a wonderful blend of ancient and modern - not shi shi modern or gentrified modern, but real life modern. Can’t recommend enough and urge everyone to support businesses in the east of the city!

Great location next to easy shopping to buy meal supplies, public transportation and old city.  Neighborhood very friendly and a great that we could park our rental car very inexpensively.  Sunny and Spacious and comfortable apt., Really appreciated the nice touches of coffee and oranges, and other snacks and towels and toiletries to help us feel at home.  Ibrahim and his wife are very caring and tentative hosts.  Highly recommend.
Ibrahim is a fantastic host who was very willing to accommodate me with an early checkin and early check out.

Had a very nice one week+ stay at Ibrahim's. Perfect location in E. Jerusalem (right next to my new office and easy walking distance to shops, restaurants, and old city). Comfortable flat with all the necessary. Ibrahim was very easy to communicate with and was kind enough to have a cold drink in the fridge, tea and coffee, as well as some basic food provisions. Very much recommended. Thanks much Ibrahim!

Ibrahim’s apartment was large,  comfy and clean and he was on hand and a friendly host.  The location is in the center of the American Colony in East Jerusalem,  an easy walk to light rail,  hotels,  and small groceries.   There are cafes (open on Shabbats) on each end of the block.  Recommend.
Ibrahim and his wife are fantastic hosts.  Apartment is large, with separate bedrooms and very close to the Old City.  They were very helpful with restaurants and places to see..  Would stay again!
Ibrahim is a wonderful and attentive host and the apartment is extremely well located, spacious, and clean. I will definitely return!

Brilliant stay at Ibrahim and sawsans apartment. It was great location, clean, spacious and a small balcony with a view. I was planning to extend my stay but plans took another direction.

Ibrahim was kind, communicative and prepared everything to ensure we felt home. I came with a friend but next time will return with my family. Thank you ibrahim.

the house had a very sharp bad smell like pee on the sofa when I entered, there was dust everywhere, dirt, not cleaned properly. i was going to stay 11 nights, but i shortened to 2 nights and left. Ibrahim was in this period too busy to deal with the house i think. he was very polite and offered to bring a cleaner again next morning and an air refresher. the house is not only very old furnished, but it also smells. if u r coming with 5 people, maybe it is worth it the price if cleaned properly, but it is not worth it for solo travelers.

Ibrahim was a gracious and knowledgeable host, knows the area well. The location is superb, 10-minute walk from Damascus Gate and around the corner from the American Colony hotel - great for afternoon drinks. The apartment is comfortable and close to a lot of food shops. The small terrace is a plus. I couldn't figure out the TV, but Ibrahim can help on the tech front. Would definitely stay here again.
reviews.response:
Thanks, Eric. I hope to see you again soon.
Best
Ibrahim

reviews.comments: Ibrahim was a very nice host and the apartment has a great location close to everything.

Ibrahim is a wonderful host, great communication, very prompt response and a pleasure to deal with.

The apartment is situated in a lovely friendly community with a taxi rank and restaurant right next door. It is very near the old town, less than a minute stroll to Damascus gate and Herod’s gate.

The apartment is well laid out, spacious, comfortable and had everything we needed.

I can highly recommend to future visitors to Jerusalem.

Many thanks Ibrahim.
Sawsan and Ibrahim are very gentle hosts

We had a very good stay in the apartment.
Hibrahim is an exceptional host. Available and very kind during our stay.
I recommend it without hesitation.
Great place, very good location!

Ibrahim's place is great  place to stay.   Everything was straightforward and Ibrahim replied quickly to queries and was there to meet us.    There was some delicious fruit awaiting us in the kitchen.  There is a sunny area outside where we sat enjoying the morning sunshine.
Ibrahim's place is very well located with spacious accommodation. Ibrahim was very responsive to any requests and was very easy to communicate with.
Thanks for having us :) Great location and cool and easy host.

This place is wonderfully located only 5 minutes walk from Damascus gate even my elderly mom( 86!) could walk it.
The apartment is on the first floor, clean and very spacious with a little terrasse.
Ibrahim is a great host, very reactive and we found fresh fruit and chocolates on the table. I can highly recommend if you want to have a feel of local East Jerusalem life!

Ibrahim's place is very centrally located: The old town can be reached in a short walk on foot, the taxi stand around the corner is also very convenient for longer journeys. The apartment is very spacious and also has a terrace to sit and eat out if the weather permits. Ibrahim is very responsive to all your needs.
reviews.response:
Thanks for pointing out this, Otto. I will take care of it. Hope to see you again soon.
Best,
Ibrahim

reviews.comments: Very close to old city, as expected for an older building.  There is a busy street adjacent so a bit noisy, but again as expected for location.  Ibrahim is a great host and very helpful.  The apartment was clean and has all you need.
reviews.response: Very happy that your first experience with Airbnb was good. Hope to see you back again.

reviews.comments: The place is even nicer than the pictures suggest, spacious and comfortable and airy and it's nice to use the balcony. It's nice to have a washing machine and separate heating in each room. Ibrahim was always there immediately if we needed anything and messaged us regularly to see if we needed anything. Plastic bottles can be recycled opposite the petrol station. This is a friendly, safe neighbourhood even for a woman walking around at night. I highly recommend it!
Very clean and comfortable. Great location and friendly welcome from Ibrahim. Thanks again for the stay!

Great location. Can walk everywhere in Jerusalem from here, especially the Old City. Spacious sitting area and comfortable bedrooms and bathrooms. The apartment is a little bit dark.  Ibrahim is a great host and check on us a couple of times during our stay to make sure everything was in order.  Highly recommended.

We staid over two weeks with our two small children in Ibrahim's place. It is a very comfortable apartment with all amenities. Good location for East Jerusalem and the old town, a few grocery shops close by and at the next corner is a very good restaurant. Ibrahim is a very friendly host and always available when we needed help.
reviews.response: Gerold arrived to Jerusalem to live and work. He stayed at my apartment while he was looking for something permanent. I enjoyed hosting him and his family and was very pleased when they extended their stay.  Will surely host them again as they were kind and considerate.

reviews.comments:
We spend five nights at Ibrahim's, and we had a great time. We were five people, and at first there were beds for only four people, so Ibrahim went right away to get a new matress for our accomodations. We had a constant comunication, we were always in touch through the airbnb app and (Hidden by Airbnb) . He is a very thoughtfull host, wether recomending local restaurants or helping us getting taxis, he was always kin to give us the best adrice.
The location is very good, very close to the old city, a ten minutes walk to Herod's gate and 15 to Damascus. However the street can get a little bit trafic-noisy during the nights, pack your earplugs.
Overall a good place and a thoughtfull host. We enjoyed our time in Jerusalem.
reviews.response: The Caballero family stayed for 5 nights at my apartment here in Jerusalem. I was very happy to meet and converse with them. They were lovely and kind enough to leave a little souvenir from Mexico. Would definitely recommend them. I hope their travels are going well!

reviews.comments: Ibrahim was at his flat to welcome us and to let us have the keys.  He showed us briefly around, gave us his contact details, and promised to return with an extra key for the outer door to the street for my colleague as we wanted to have two complete sets in case we got split up.  He did not return with this extra key.
reviews.response: Sorry Jonathan, but you mentioned that you and your colleague were always moving together so I didn't think an extra copy of the outside gate would be absolutely crucial. I have emailed Jonathan during his stay to see if he needed anything but he didn't answer. I sat with you for over half an hour to welcome you and i gave you a lot of information on where to go, how to find taxis and bus stations, and how to get to Bethlehem and to Dheishe refugee camp and how to get to Ramallah and which bus and shuttle service to get to Nablus, i even drew maps for you.

reviews.comments: Great place! We really enjoyed staying at Ibrahim's lovely apartment, and it's a short walk from the old city. Ibrahim was also a great host--we were delayed coming into Jerusalem, but he was very flexible with our key pickup time. We'd definitely stay there again!

Appartement très bien situé, proche de la vieille ville et du centre, commerces et transports pour visiter Jerusalem à proximité.  Bonne literie (important pour moi car j'ai des problèmes de dos),  spacieux et propre.  Il faudrait juste penser à ajouter un micro-ondes, 1 placard en plus dans la cuisine (manque de rangement pour courses),  1 petite télé pour les enfants, et nécessité d'améliorer la terrasse ( 1 store pour le soleil) et 1 store neuf pour les chambres. Sinon c'était bien.   Brigitte et Essam  (séjour fin juillet 2019)

Ibrahim a toujours était disponible à chaques fois que nous avions une question.

L'appartement est bien équipé, avec plein de petites attentions. On s'y sent chez nous !

L'emplacement est parfait à 10min de la porte d'Herod, et 15min de la porte de damas (environ). Donc vielle ville faisable à pied (nous l'avons fait avec un bébé en poussette)
Tout ça en étant tout de même dans une rue calme, proche de tout commerces : épicerie, restaurant, parking à 2 pas de l'appartement à un prix imbattables sur Jérusalem (25 shekel/24h), transport en commun (arrêt "ministère de la justice").
Appartement clair, ensoleillé et bien équipé, tout proche de la Vieille Ville et d’un quartier commerçant. Idéal pour un séjour familial, avec un « super -host très disponible et accueillant

Ibrahim fue una gran persona con nosotras. Nuestro vuelo llegó a la madrugada y él nos esperó a que llegaramos (5 am) Fue atento cada vez que le enviamos un mensaje y nos ayudó con información del lugar, y para cambiar dinero. Realmente es fue un placer y una tranquilidad rentar su departamento. Además, el sitio esta muy cerca de la ciudad vieja y en una zona tranquila pero con acceso al transporte público. Gracias nuevamente

description: Vous voulez passer un séjour de rêve a Jerusalem ?Nous serons très heureux de vous recevoir dans notre logement.L'appartement se situe en plein centre ville, une épicerie se trouve en bas de l'immeuble. Il y a une station de tramway a deux pas du logement, ce qui vous permettra de visiter la ville facilement.L'appartement est entièrement meublé, déposez simplement vos valises et profitez de la ville.Tout a été pensé et décoré pour que vous vous sentiez à l'aise comme chez vous...A bientôt.

reviews.comments: The apartment is spacious. Good location, next to light rail and supermarket downstairs. Plenty of restaurants nearby. Great city view. The host is kind, considerate and accommodating. Definitely recommend staying here.  :)

Shirane and Ouriel were very attentive hosts and went above and beyond to make sure any issues were quickly resolved. For example, when we could not find the entrance to the building, Ouriel came to meet us...and when there was an issue with the air conditioner hours before a major holiday started he personally came and fixed it. It's this kind of commitment that makes them special hosts!
Great place and location!

The flat is very nice, spacious and clean. It's also very bright with a nice view of the city thanks to the big windows of each room - pictures don't do justice to the place :)
Location is perfect too. Within walking distance of Mahane Yehuda market and to the main tram line on Jaffa street and close to the old city.
Shirane and Ouriel were very helpful with anything we needed and all the additional requests we made. They explained perfectly how to make the automatic check-in before the arrival and let us get in before the agreed time.
We definitely recommend their place.
Perfect location and beautiful views from this spacious apartment. No personal touch but the host was helpful and I would say good value for money.

The apartment has a perfect location:walking distance from the old town and the market. It also has an amazing view from all the the rooms. It is big, silent with two very comfortable couch beds. Shirane helped us and has been very accommodating for all our further request. I would definitely come back. Thank you.

Stefano

4,5 ⭐ Great locations, good price, amazing view!!Next to Jaffa street, close to market and old sity. Apartment are in 6th floor, so you will have great view on the city. Apartments are sunny, enough place. Good communication with owner. Almost great, only a few things what was promised wasn't as expected, but that was just small thing. Shirane respected our privacy and come on help when we needed. We didn't know that hot water has a timer, he helped set time what was better for us, so don't forget to ask that when you come. Also he let us left our luggage before check in time.

The house is located at centre of the city. Great location. 3 min walk from tram stop and Machane Yehuda. The rooms are super clean and specious. Good enough for a family of 6 members. We really enjoyed the facilities during the stay.

The apartment is very nice and clean. Close to the Mahane Yehuda market and in good walking distance to the old city. A parking spot is available. Just make sure to inform the host a few days in advance so they can organize it.

Location is good. It is near to Mahane Yehuda market. You can go to old city for 20 minute on foot. And you can use transportation conveniently.
Apartment is clean and host is good.
We was happy for living in this apartment.
RAS

Nous avons beaucoup aimé l'excellent rapport qualité/prix, la localisation, la proximité du tram, les pièces spacieuses, la vue, le calme, l'équipement électro-ménager (lave-vaisselle, lave-linge, sèche-linge). L'appartement serait parfait avec davantage de vaisselle et ustensiles de cuisine.  Accueil sympathique et bonne communication.

L'appartement était beaucoup plus jolie que les photos. L'appart était grand et propre. La cuisine était belle, mais un peu vide. j'aurai aimer cuisiner, mais malheureusement il manquait du matériel de cuisine. On n'a pas pu entrer la voiture dans le parking, car le samedi c’était le shabbat et l’hôte n'a pas pu enregistrer mon immatriculation pour la sécurité. L’hôte a trouvé une solution, donc on s'est gare plus loin dans un autre parking. Location était très bien situé. Un bon rapport qualité prix.

amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper

description: Welcome to our brand new, stylish and comfortable apartment in the heart of Jerusalem!  This beautiful home on Jaffa Street is waiting for you to come relax and enjoy a vacation with your loved ones. The apartment has all necessities and luxuries to make sure your stay is perfect, in a brand new secured building Just a few steps away from endless restaurants, bars, and shopping and the western wall.The spaceLocated in the center of Jerusalem, this beautiful apartment is the perfect place for a family vacation or a business trip.The feeling you get when you walk into the apartment is that you are entering a very charming and quiet place where you can relax and take a break from the hectic urban life. Giving you the feeling of a real holiday with cozy bedrooms, a large and comfortable open-concept kitchen, and a bright dining room. The apartment has a clean, spacious, and fully equipped kitchen with all modern facilities. Including a fridge, microwave, oven, coffee machine, stove and plenty of counter space.Bedrooms are furnished with a big, comfortable bed and closet for your comfort and convenienceA nice and spacious bathroom. And a large balcony overlooking the city. AC, TV, WiFi are available as well as a washing machine and a hairdryer. Everything you might need is just down the street. There are lots of stores, restaurants, bars and coffee shops around the apartment Overall this is a great apartment to host friends and families, very comfortable and safe, amazing central location with gorgeous views. It is in the very center of Jerusalem and has everything you need within easy reach, from restaurants and shops to cultural activities.Guest accessThe whole apartment is at your disposal for a pleasant stay.  You will have access to a fully equipped kitchen, free Wi-Fi connection all amenities are at your disposal. Kitchen appliances are included as well as the washing machine and A/C unit. The apartment comes with fresh towels and bedsheetsOther things to noteWe have multiple apartment in the same buildings as well as communicant apartments perfect for groups or family eventsIsraeli citizens will be required to pay an additional 17% for the VAT
additional_house_rules: Israeli citizens will be required to pay an additional 17% for the VAT
interaction: We are always available for you, either in person, by email, phone or messages.We provide you with all the information you require to have a pleasant stay and ultimate peace of mind.We would be happy to answer all your questions and provide recommendations for your stay. We speak English, French, Hebrew and Russian. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask.
transit: All public transportation (Tramway, Train, Bus, Taxi) are at the door of the building or within minutes of apartment.

reviews.comments: nice apartment

Do not be misled by this listing.  You will not be staying in the advertised rental.  The rental we were placed in was unclean, grimy and poorly kept, the veranda was literally unusable as it was so filthy with what looked like weeks worth of uncleaned grime and bird mess. So while the location is good, if you want to get what you pay for, go elsewhere.
Nice apartment with a great balcony. Unfortunately we didn't get it in a very clean shape :(
Appartement avec une grande terrasse en plein centre de Jerusalem. La communication avec HolySuites est très simple. Excellent sejour!

description: 3.5 Room Apt. in German Colony ,Jerusalem2 Bed-rooms 1 livin-groom 1 kid Room,1 toilet ,1 bathroom, 1 office room (under constraction),  (a large Kitchen and 300 sq yard) Beautiful view over German colony 1 minute on foot From "first station" Jerusalem and bus station to all over Jerusalem areas close to city center and old city 15 min on foot ',.Enjoy the ideal location in JerusalemThe spacegorgeous 3.5 + 1 office Room, in a Templar German House. it has a special authentic design - thick walls,  brick inner wall,  a great atmosphere. it is also located in the most charming, fun and historical neighborhood in Jerusalem.Guest accessThe apartment comes fully furnished with fast wireless internet, full-kitchen,washing machine, Clothes Dryer ,Refrigerator, freezer ,towels linens ,extra blankets ,It has a 2 double bed In every bedroom, Cabinets for shelving, And a Large Garden with Seating Areas,office for workplace ( office under constraction) . There is free parking 50 meter from the apartment... and many more other things for the staying ...Other things to note-Free wifi .-Free coffe, tea and cold water ( Coffee corner) . -Free guest pc using .-TV with ps4 ( lot of games) ,netflix, in room 1 .-TV with chrome tv in room 2 .
interaction: We will be very happy to answer any questions that you may have during your staying... we will be glad to advise you about the most interesting places in Jerusalem.
transit: there is lot of transportation (all the time of the day until 23:59 PM ,Buses every 5 Min)its a very central neighborhood close to anywhere in Jerusalem (The heart of Jerusalem)there is free parking lot 30 seconds on foot from the house

reviews.comments: The location is excellent and the apartment has a great yard. There a few small things that need to be fixed in the apartment such as no WiFi and no AC, but everything was really comfortable . Again, the location outweighs everything else!
Dor’s house and garden fits very well for children, we enjoyed the neighborhood- and the house is very well located. Beautiful garden and space

Great location
clean and cool place

Exellent location, near to everything. Very nice garden. Dor is a great host.
Thanks!!

We had a great weekend stay in this real Templar stone house in the middle of the German colony. Dor is an extremely kind host and it was very nice to interact with him at check in and check out. The garden has a huge space and is protected by big trees. We had our lunch, dinner and breakfast outside (October). The location is very central - short walking distance from the first station district. The is also a free parking space in a short walking distance, otherwise main bus lines are nearby.
אזור  מדהים  ביופיו

description: come and spend your Jerusalem holyday in a perfect brand new 2 rooms apt. the place offers not only stunning view of Jerusalem and the mountains surrownding, but also enjoys lot of fresh air.The spaceSpend you Jerusalem holiday in the perfect place: a new 2 rooms apt. Nice apartment, little but very confortable and with beautiful vue at the city. With good washing and drying machine. For us (no car) was very far from the center. Richard was already ready to help. Nice stay.
Really nice apt and amazing view! Richard and his daughter Orit are helpful and nice hosts. Will certainly consider this place for next trip!
Michael Richard is a wonderful, kind and most helpful host and any request was promptly seen to.

This beautiful home on Mahané Yehuda and Jaffa Street is waiting for you to come relax and enjoy a vacation with your loved ones. The apartment has all necessities and luxuries to make sure your stay is perfect. Just a few steps away from endless restaurants, bars, and shopping and the western wall.The spaceLocated in the center of Jerusalem, this beautiful apartment is the perfect place for a family vacation or a business trip.The feeling you get when you walk into the apartment is that you are entering a very charming and quiet place where you can relax and take a break from the hectic urban life. Giving you the feeling of a real holiday with 1 cozy bedroom, a large and comfortable open-concept kitchen, and a bright dining room. The apartment has a clean, spacious, and fully equipped kitchen with all modern facilities. Including a fridge, microwave, oven, coffee machine, stove and plenty of counter space.The bedroom is furnished with a big, comfortable bed and closet for your comfort and convenience And a nice and spacious bathroom.AC, TV, WiFi are available as well as a washing machine and a hairdryer. Everything you might need is just down the street. There are lots of stores, restaurants, bars and coffee shops around the apartment Overall this is a great apartment to host friends and families, very comfortable and safe, amazing central location with gorgeous views. It is in the very center of Jerusalem and has everything you need within easy reach, from restaurants and shops to cultural activities.Guest accessThe whole apartment is at your disposal for a pleasant stay.  You will have access to a fully equipped kitchen, free Wi-Fi connection all amenities are at your disposal. Kitchen appliances are included as well as the washing machine and A/C unit. reviews.comments: We enjoyed our stay: great location and very clean/spacious.  Great way to begin: this was our first Airbnb experience.  Constructive criticism: few routine household items like hangers, disposable paper products.  Otherwise a very positive experience.

This AirBnB has serious problems. The apartment lost power on the third night of my stay. I contacted the host, who did not respond until the following morning. The host then notified me that the building occasionally loses power. That's an incredibly important piece of information that should have been in the description of the apartment, especially since I needed to do work and the AirBnB had no WiFi for extended periods of time. Eventually, I simply left the AirBnB. The host claimed that power was back, but when I checked the apartment, there was still no power. Repeated power outages are not the hallmark of a high quality AirBnB. The apartment also had the smell of old standing water.
N/a

description: One of a kind listing a detached stone house from the1800s that's been in our family since then.The property was just renovated with stainless-steel aplliances and brand new bathrooms. A 10 minute drive from the heart of Bethlehem city and its famous nativity church where our lord Jesus was born, it is also a 25 minute drive to the heart of the holy city of Jerualem where you can enjoy its beautful ancient markets that leads to the famous religious cites that toursist flock every day of the yearThe spaceA late-ottoman, early British Mandate composition, located in the city of Beit Jala 10km south of Jerusalem. The house originally consisted of 2 vaulted rooms with a front yard arcade (Riwaq). The beauty of this traditional construction materials of thick stone walls provides the best environment inside the rooms all year long, where it provides a warm atmosphere during the cold winters and coolness during the summers.The unit has always been used as a simple residential living space, and now with minor modifications has been restored to accommodate comfortable modern day needs, such as the kitchen space and toilets, which were once spaces detached from the living space and hosted in the external yard of the house. The house now of an approximate area of 130 m2, consists of an open space with the living, kitchen and dining areas, and two bedrooms with separate bathrooms. Nearby is a beautiful garden with trees, seasonal flowers, vegetables, fruit and herbs.Guest accessGuests have access to the Garden area as well as a cozy under-vine seating /barbecue area
interaction: Massage or call, or just knock on the neighbour's door 😉
transit: The House is located suitably with a 5 minuet walk to the main road where from there one can take a 5 minutes taxi or bus ride to Bethlehem or a 30 minutes bus ride towards Jerusalem.*****When and if choosing a rental car, kindly make sure that the insurance policy of the rental company covers both israel  and the West Bank, Palestine.

reviews.comments: Beautiful old house renovated  to provide a blend between old and modern life in Palestine. The host (Lina) was friendly and cooperative.

This AirBnb feels like a boutique hotel. The architecture and decor is even more beautiful than the pictures show. Lina and her family are kind, quick to respond, and generous with their time. I would definitely stay here again.

We loved staying here. It is a beautifully restored home and a nice mix of modern and traditional finishes.  The garden and view from the hills are a nice relief from the bustle of Bethlehem, and the whole family and neighbors were so welcoming and helpful.  Highly recommend this special place.

This was a great place to stay during our visit to the Holy Land. This was a trip primarily for my 75 yo Mom. The home was very clean and we were provided with some fresh fruit grown on the property! Because of the stone construction I affectionately called it the "Flintstones Home." We enjoyed a local breakfast which was very tasty the "downside" was they gave us entirely too much food. Lina also arranged for us to take local private tours with RaMez who is a very pleasant young man. He went about and beyond, our first day began approximately 1030a and last until 930p, quite a day. We then hired him for 6 hours the next day. I would recommend anyone stay there, very comfortable home staying with a very fine family. Lina's Dad, Simon, Mom and I had interesting conversation over some local sweets at a cafe. I so enjoyed the Flintstones home and the history family even more. Oh, our first night out to dinner, Lina and her siblings gave us a ride home, as they were out also.

This is a beautiful hidden getaway at the heart of Beit Jala/Bethlehem.
The place is absolutely gorgeous, beautiful old Palestinian style house. It is completely sparkling clean. The hosts are flexible, very nice and communicative.
The sitting area outside is so quiet and beautiful, with grapes and grape leaves hanging down. The hosts also left a “things to do” in Bethlehem, and details about the amenities and add on options as well! (A traditional Palestinian breakfast if ordered before hand). I highly highly recommend this place for anyone wanting to come to Bethlehem/Beit Jala for a weekend getaway or longer. Great value for price and exceptional stay. Will definitely be coming back again!
I love this place, definitely I’ll go back

Lina’s place is one of the nicest places I’ve ever stayed in. The host and her family are very accommodating and attentive. They live right next door so if you need anything they’re always there to help but do not bother you if you want your privacy.

The space is beautiful. You’ll have access to a huge outdoor space and garden that has a number of fruits and vegetables growing, which you can help yourself to! They also left us a basket of fruit on our arrival which was really nice.

The actual home is also fantastic, the living room and kitchen are a large open space with a lot of big windows and natural light. One of the windows overlooks the garden and has a massive window seat which is ideal for reading a book or an afternoon nap! They also provided a traditional breakfast which includes home made jams, olives and more.. delicious :)

Both rooms are big and comfortable, the bathrooms are brand new and very clean with a pretty strong water pressure which is rare to find in this area!

They also provide a list of services and tours which include a Jeep safari, a political tour, food, and laundry which we unfortunately didn’t have the time to take advantage of but hopefully next time!

It didn’t matter for us since we had rented a car but the place is located on a pretty steep hill (as is the nature of beit jala), so keep that in mind! It’s very close to the center of beit jala where you can find great restaurants, bars, churches, and the old city. It’s a very short drive to Bethlehem as well but isolated enough to give a sense of how village life used to be, with a sense of quiet, peace and tranquility. Jerusalem is also a short trip away!

Highly recommended to anyone looking to spend time in Bethlehem, beit jala and the surrounding area!

This is a great house; great hosts, great architecture/renovation, and just a great space for relaxing. We took a little personal retreat without our kids here and it was exactly what we were looking for.

Lina was a great host! Communication was amazing, Lina would always answer promptly. The airbnb was also great. it was clean, easy to access, and spacious. The location was in close proximity to the heart of Beit Jala and a short drive away from Bethlehem. We would definitely stay here again.
Thank you Lina and family for making us feel so welcome again. ACs are now in the rooms too, which is great in this summer heat.

This was such a surreal experience! The house is beautiful, extremely clean, and has so many amazing touches that reflect Palestinian history and heritage in such a lovely way. The rooms are large, bathrooms renovated and modern, kitchen well-equipped, and hosts were super nice. They were there whenever we needed them. Thank you Lina! We will be coming back very soon.
Thank you Lina.. the house is incredibly amazing. Very much Palestinian atmosphere.. the house is clean, and the space is amazing.. we loved it :)

The house is incredibly beautiful. Every detail is taken care off and Lina made us feel so welcome and made our Christmas in Bethlehem very special. We wanted to stay forever! The only thing that needs improving is the heating system. Everything else is just perfect. Location is also good, on walking distance to the centre of Beit Jala and most places in Bethlehem too. Also the garden is to die for. It must be a dream staying there in the summer. Warmly recommended!
Lina's stonehouse is so beautiful; an amazing space with lovely touches set in a beautiful garden. Not only that but Lina was an amazing host, very hospitable and flexible. Thank you Lina!
Beautiful apartment and very helpful hosts. Will definitely come back.

This place is a must stay! In a beautiful part of town, just outside of Bethlehem lies this exceptional and unique home. Lina and her family are wonderful hosts and very hospitable and guided us during our short time in Palestine. The place itself is very clean and filled with beautiful touches that make it feel just like home.

We were very excited when we saw the photos and read the reviews but we didn’t realise just how beautiful it was until we came. We are so glad to have stayed at Lina’s place.

I would highly recommend this place to all tourists visiting the sites of Jerusalem and Bethlehem :)
Great and easy communication with the host, Lina. Great place to stay near Betlehem: with small details, everything was very clean. Enjoyable stay.
Fantastic authentic house and very friendly hosts!
We celebrated Christmas at Lina's and the house was simply amazing (including a Christmas tree and self-made cookies).
Like staying in a castle!

The place is REALLY GOOD it was over my expectations actually is better than the pictures, modern combinated with the classic of the city, all the installations are clean and comfy, perfect to travel with your family, don't use Waze to arrive is better (Hidden by Airbnb) maps any way you will get lost because  Bethlehem is a labyrinth but keep calm and enjoy, all the area and the city is very safe, the place has a vine garden out site and is part por the property and the host offers you for free some of their homemade products, they live next door so if you need something they will help you right away but at the same time they will give you the space to relax. I loved Bethlehem and my stay.

We can more than recommend to stay at the place! If you want to stay near to Jerusalem and Bethlehem to do some sightseeing, this place is perfect.
The beds are really comfortable and the two bathrooms are spacious and practical if you travel as two pairs (especially the shower cabin with space for two was nice to have). The design was old school but it had modern features.

The house is much better, more spacious & unique than on the pictures. We really loved being there. It like a design hotel with some little antique details, comfy bads & chilly corners. Very good cooking possibilities as well

We highly recommend accommodation at Stone House in Beit Jala. It is a place where you can fall in love at first sight! Everything is decorated beautifully and with attention to details. An absolutely unique place also thanks to the wonderful owners. Lina, you are amazing people and we wish you all nice guests;)
Thank you for pleasant moments and delicious breakfast delicacies. We dream of apricot jam at night <3
;)

Importantly, the area is safe. We came here with the whole family (5 people) and met only friendly people in Beit Jala. Great place as a starting point to Jerusalem (bus connection) and Bethlehem.

Thanks again for a great time. We hope that we will be able to come back here for longer. <3

You are the best:)

The house was amazing! The hosts were very nice and helpful. They left us olives, jams and other things from their garden for breakfast that were delicious.
One important thing to know is that if you want to rent a car, the car insurance from the international companys like Hertz, Avis etc, doesn’t cover Palestinian territory, so it’s better to rent it from a local company.
This place is the reason why Airbnb was intended to be in the first place. Extraordinary location, lovely hosts and an experience we did not expect. We totally recommend this place.
The place is magic! With a unique touch and great hospitality! We really love our stay in here. The family invite us over to take some coffee and chat about everything! Definitely recommend!

Lina and her familly are so lovely. They prepared a cake for the birthdays of our daughter. The house was just renovated and all is beautiful : rooms, living room and bathrooms. A very peaceful place to stay. I recommend this adress!

Beautiful space, amazing antique house, sparkling clean, spacious, everything was perfect. Very hospitable hosts offered us a taste of super delicious local palestinian food!
Thank you!

reviews.comments:
Roni was a very kind & caring host! His home is close to the Old City & the Old Train Station. As for the sleeping space, this was my first stay at a shared space. I had a private room, but shared bathroom, kitchen & commonplace area. As a new experience of sharing space, it all worked out. But I prefer my own space.
Roni was very accommodating to me & my dog. He made us feel very welcomed. His dog Ceasar, is really big & really sweet. This place is best suited for a true dog lover!

Roni was a very hospitable and welcoming host.  He drove us to the beginning of a Bethlehem tour and helped us deal with our tour guide on the phone.  His place was beautiful, and the rooftop view is great.  Roni was clearly passionate about Jerusalem and was a gracious host.  The only downsides were that the location was more remote than we had previously thought, and Roni expressed some troubling anti-Arab sentiments at times.  All in all, it was a nice experience for some weary American backpackers in Jerusalem.
Roni was quite welcoming!  His dog, Ceazer, is so friendly.  The house is beautiful, and the room is just right.

We loved staying with Roni.  His apartment is so charming and eclectic.  He plants flowers everywhere on the front patio and the roof.  The view of old Jerusalem from the roof is postcard-perfect.  It's walking distance to the Old City.  Roni is very warm and friendly.  He clearly enjoys people and is full of ideas of what to do.  And he makes a great Israeli breakfast if you want it.  We will definitely stay with him again when we go back someday.
reviews.response: thanks  for  your  warm words  ..  happy you enjoyed here

reviews.comments:
Roni was amazing.

The view of the Old City was better than advertised. Roni was extremely helpful and hospitable. The place was very clean.

I was extremely satisfied with my experience.

Roni's home is well located for visiting old Jerusalem, Yaffa Street,and the lovely new Railroad Station entertainment area.  The accomodations are comfortable and the garden, rooftop terrace, and Ceasar are great.  Roni drove us to get groceries and to the City of David, and  provided good directions, suggestions, and interesting information about the neighborhood.. Thank you for your help during our short stay in Jerusalem.

reviews.comments: Roni's apartment is a gem.  Could easily sleep 4 with the 2 rooms.  We were only 2 people staying though.  His garden is gorgeous and the view from the roof alone is worth the visit.  We were able to use his kitchen and bathroom without issue.  The bed was comfortable and was a queen sized, uncommon in Israel but welcomed.  Roni is a knowledgable and helpful host.  He gave us a private tour of the forest area of Jerusalem and taught us some israeli songs.  His dog is large, but friendly – staying outside most of the time.  The apartment has ample parking and is a short 12 minute walk to the Jaffa Gate in the old city.  We would recommend Roni's Cozy Garden to everyone.
reviews.response: thanks for your warm words happy you enjoy .. hope you have safe jearny home

reviews.comments: Roni's apartment is in a fantastic location...about a 10-15 minute walk to the Old City, near restaurants, and the views of the Old City are really great both during the day and at night.  Roni's a great host...he communicates promptly, responds to questions with thorough answers and is a very generous, hospitable host.  The room is great...bed is very comfortable, there's enough room for storage of clothes and items (I stayed for 4 nights).  Highly recommend staying with Roni...I will the next time I visit Jerusalem.
reviews.response: thank you  i  appriciate your warm words

reviews.comments: I can't say enough about Roni, extremely wonderful host, highly recommend him if you decide to stay at one of his places. I came with my 8 month old son and not only did he allow it but provided us with a baby bed, and went out of his way to make sure we had everything we need. The apartment was also nice, cozy and clean,he provided breakfast and snacks for the apartment, so we really didn't have to go shopping, he also has a magnificent rooftop view of the old city.  Thanks for the wonderful experience. My husband and I hope to come stay again in the future...
Roni's place is clean, comfortable and stylish. The area is easy to get to the old city. Roni was very helpful and gave us a lot of advice and useful tips. We really recommend this house!

Roni is a warm and friendly host who showed hospitality and willingness to share. This was much appreciated for my first trip to Israel. I arrived quite late and was very grateful that Roni waited up for me.
He had the heating in in my room with big soft towels for me to use. I had a really good sleep.
Unfortunately the place could do with decluttering and cleaning out. Lots of empty shampoo bottles and body wash bottles in the bathroom.
reviews.response: thanks

reviews.comments:
We stayed with Roni for a few nights and I can highly recommend his place. First, the location. His place is south of Mt Zion, directly across the valley.
The rooftop terrace has a view of the old city, from Mt. Zion to the Temple Mount. It is a 15 minute walk to Jaffa Gate, so it is also a very convenient location. We never needed to use our car while there.

You can cook there, though the working space in the kitchen is small, so you probably won't want to prepare any large feasts. The rooms are comfortable and we slept well. Outside, there is a walled garden with a small terrace. The place is very comfortable.

Roni and his dog live there, so you are staying with him, though you have free run of the downstairs portion of the place. He's easygoing. friendly and knowledgeable. If you dislike dogs, then his place is not for you. His dog is very big, very sociable, very friendly and wants to be petted as much as possible. If you do like dogs, then you'll love his dog.
Great!

Great place to stay. Very nice care.
15 min. Walk to Jaffa Gate.
