Great place to stay. Roni is a superb host. 3rd time we were here for almost 2 weeks. House offers all you need. Walking distance from the old city as well as city center. First railway station and supermarket within 5 minutes walking. Roof terrace and view are very special.

Positive was that Roni greeted us warmely and the view on the rooftop was amazing! Negative were the unfortunate omnipresent dog smell however the apartment has character and we recommend it to anyone who interested in a somewhat different stay.
Everything was very nice - also second time around. Top experience.
Roni is a very kind and welcoming host. We instantly fell at home in his beautiful abs spacious house. An extra gem is the rooftop terrace with a spectacular view of the Old City of Jerusalem.

Roni deserves the recognition as 'best host ever'. His hospitaliy and helpfullness was exceptional, especially as my friend was hospitalized. His home is an oasis of peace with a beautiful garden between diplomates and UN delegates castles.  He is also very knowledgable. His dog César is adorable, too.

Also he will help in anything you may need; he booked a sharing taxi for us to reach tel aviv airport which came to collect us in front of house!
The house is 15 minutes walking from the jaffa gate of the old city. At Roni's place you will not find luxury, but a good atmosphere and Cesar, a big friendly and lovely dog who will make your stay special!

reviews.comments:
Me and my Family had a great time staying in Jerusalem with Roni.
He is a wonderful host and he gave us precious tips for our time in Jerusalem and also for the rest of our trip in Israel.
His house is very good located and it is a short walk to the old city of Jerusalem.
The view from the roof top was just fantastic.
Roni is a very friendly and helpfull person and it is great talking with him about the history and the actuell situation of Israel.
We all had a wonderful time in Ronis house
and also his dog Ceasar is very firendly
and nice.
We highly recommend Ronis place for staying in Jerusalem.

If you plan on visiting Jerusalem, we highly recommend to stay with Roni! Roni is a great story-teller, he told us about Israel's history, e.g. the Siege of Masada or the Kibbutz movements. Every morning he served delicious breakfast and gave us tips for our excursions. The apartment is beautifully decorated and the view of the roof just perfect. We felt very welcome.

Roni is a great kindness. He gave us lots of tips for visiting Jerusalem museums as well as restaurants. We had a great time chatting with him. His house is very well located, you can walk to the old town and there is a mall with restaurants / bars is a 5 minute walk. Its roof top is fantastic, you can see the old Jerusalem. We strongly advise go Roni!

Roni est d'une grande gentillesse. Il nous a donné beaucoup de conseils pour visiter Jérusalem: aussi bien les musées que les restaurants. On a passé de très bons moments à discuter avec lui. Sa maison est très bien située, on peut aller à pied dans la vieille ville et il y a un centre avec restaurants/bars est à 5 minutes à pied. Sa terrasse sur le toit est fantastique, on peut admirer le vieux Jérusalem. Nous conseillons vivement d'aller chez Roni!!!

reviews.comments: The apartment is located in a very good location. Quiet and cozy. Host very friendly and helpful. Roni feel with you at home :)

My parents and I really enjoy the stay at Roni's place. The house is a bit old but cozy and warm with many lovely decorations. It is 15 to 20 minutes' walk from Roni's place to the Old City. The huge but cute dog Ceaser is the most docile dog I have ever seen. If you want to have a convenient access to the Old City, Roni's place is one of the best choices.

The room is quite well situated, near the Old Town. The best part of this deal is the host Roni, who was very helpful, although a little boheme, which in practise ment that we got breakfast only one morning out of three. The dog was a loving creature too!

Roni is a great host. He appeared to be very firendly, helpful and supporting. He spend extra time to find us a bus timetable to Dead See, offered us a fruits on our way home and suggested great concert and a nice place to eat. His appartment is very close to the city center, easy communicated with public transport and at the same time in a quiet and safe location. It is decorated in unique style, very clean and cosy and has breathtaking view from the roof-terrace. We spent great time there and strongly reccomed for everyone.

We stayed in Jerusalem at this place for two nights and felt comfortable there. Roni is a real nice guy and his dog Cesar also, but you have to like dogs this size which was no problem for us. Cesar was a very cuddly dog. The apartment is a special but cozy place, the roof top with the view over the old city is gorgeous. Roni recommend us the old train station with live music and restaurants, only a five minute walk away. Roni has a affectionate cultivated garden with many plants. We would recommend this place.

It's a wonderfull location: we were every night on the roof and saw the Old City of Jerusalem. You cannot describe this impression. Breathtaking!! - In 15 - 20 min. you are in the Old City. So we need no car. Roni was very helpfull. Thank you for all informations and the support.

We found Roni to be a very friendly and helpful host. The garden which includes the rooftop is charming and full of character. The atmosphere is very relaxed and guests are welcome to all the amenities.

We would be very happy to stay with Roni again on our next trip to Jerusalem.

Sandi and Offer from Sydney, Australia
Great host and location!

But other then that, its a cool place to stay. The roof top is gorgeous.

Het huis is gevestigd op een mooie locatie, op loopafstand van de oude stad maar ook van bijv. een supermarkt, First Railway Station en Emek Refaim. Dus eet en drinkgelegenheid om de hoek. Mooi dakterras vol planten. Gebruik van wasmachine en droger mogelijk. Perfecte host: nooit opdringerig, goed bereikbaar, duidelijke afspraken en veel toeristische tips indien je die zoekt.

Хорошее предложение для тех кто в основном нацелен на осмотр старого города. Достаточно близко (10-15 мин.) до Яффских ворот, отличный вид с крыши на армянский квартал, Купол скалы и Масляничную гору. Рядом (место называется Первая станция) можно кушать, там же супермаркет), это на перекрёстке в старый город.

Net als afgelopen voorjaar, nu weer genoten van ons verblijf bij Roni. HIj is voor ons de perfecte gastheer, altijd aanwezig als je em nodig hebt maar met genoeg wederzijdse privacy. Huis ligt geweldig, mooie buurt, dakterras is super. Prima qua temperatuur, geen narigheid met kou of vocht. En bovenal de lieve Ceazer!!!

Roni a tout prévu pour notre arrivé: les clefs dans la boite aux lettre (il était au travail), les instructions, etc. Son chien a été aussi très content de nous accueillir.
Roni, c’est une personne serviable et très attentionnée.
L’appartement se situ près de la vielle ville, dans un quartier très agréable.
Il y a eu entre nous et Roni la confiance et la bonne entente.

Roni ist ein klasse Gastgeber - tolles Frühstück, gute Tips, anregende und informative Gespräche. Roni hat uns mehrfach gefahren - das war wirklich sehr nett...
Die Unterkunft ist ok; besonders schön der Terrassenblick auf die Altstadt. Cesar, Ronis Hund, ist auch nett und verträglich - man sollte Hunde aber mögen, wenn man bei Roni wohnt.
